properties.areaDesc: Waters from Altamaha Sound GA to Fernandina Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 9 at 2:48PM EST until January 12 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...East Southeast winds 15 to 20 knots, becoming South
Saturday night. Seas 5 to 10 feet, with occasional seas up to 13
feet.

* WHERE...Waters from Altamaha Sound GA to Fernandina Beach FL
from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From 4 AM Friday to noon EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM FRIDAY TO NOON EST SUNDAY
